snippet: The Italian government declared a state of emergency on Friday in areas struck by flooding and mud slides earlier this week, and allocated $92 million to assist residents there.
lead_paragraph: The Italian government declared a state of emergency on Friday in areas struck by flooding and mud slides earlier this week, and allocated $92 million to assist residents there.

headline.main: Italy: Emergency Declared in Flood Zones
headline.print_headline: Italy: Emergency Declared in Flood Zones
headline.seo: Italy Declares Emergency in Flood Zones
